column3: a pain reliever and fever reducer. It is thought to work to relieve minor aches and pains by elevating the body's overall pain threshold so you feel less pain
an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing
a histamine-2 blocker that works by decreasing the amount of acid the stomach produces. It is used to treat and prevent ulcers in the stomach and intestines
a decongestant that shrinks blood vessels in the nasal passages. Dilated blood vessels can cause nasal congestion (stuffy nose)
an antibiotic used to treat many different types of infections caused by bacteria
column8: and E. coli or salmonella infection

column3: a narcotic pain medication used to treat moderate to severe pain. Short-acting formulations are taken as needed for pain
a salicylate (sa-LIS-il-ate). It works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain
an antibiotic that fights bacteria. Amoxicillin is used to treat many different types of infection caused by bacteria
a central nervous system stimulant that affects chemicals in the brain and nerves that contribute to hyperactivity and impulse control
a drug that is produced by the pineal gland in animals and regulates sleep and wakefulness
a medication that thins and loosens mucus in the airways
column4: making it easier to cough up the mucus

column3: a corticosteroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation. It is used to treat conditions such as arthritis
